Bugfixes & Features

  • Unique article image filenames
  • Fix contact forms parameter issues
  • Latest news module article ordering
  • Better short article content creation. If a pagebreak element exists, will use that. Otherwise, splits from the first full stop.
  • Categories can now have images
  • Comment authoring now shows the correct author
  • Enable setting login and logout destinations
  • New redirect component
  • Modules can now automatically load their own javascript files
  • Better admin panel menu
  • Remove Google plus links
  • Child categories are now fully supported
  • New user creation in Admin now hashes the password properly
  • New menu item types. External links and Aliases
  • Better error information on SQL fails
  • Fixed a bug in which no old sessions were being removed
  • Allow installation of Components, Modules and Hooks via zip file upload
